body:
A useful package, but based on python 2.

Four issues of note:
  1. I copied numpy's `set_blas_lapack` function.  It would be great if I could call it directly instead.
  2. I had to work around the "--single-version-externally-managed" build flag added by spack.
  3. I had to create a patch to remove a "refs" data-element cython didn't like (package-specific)
  4. I detest flake8. There is nothing wrong with my typing, and I refuse to let a machine tell me otherwise.
title: Added py-horton package.
